My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off a practiced formula to get the result I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Figuring out what project I want to start with, researching similar webpages to get an idea for the structure of the website.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Getting opinions based on color and text. This is the step I use to generate everything I need for the site, photos, links, icons, etc.

3

UI/UX planning

Using wireframes to plan out UI of website.

4

Implementation

Following the wireframe or psd until project is complete.
